cause.description:
Meat eating should not be frowned upon. No matter what anyone says, how many videos PETA makes, or how many celebrities become vegetarians, I love nothing more than a bleeding steak on my plate. Mmmmm!
1. Meat is delicious.
2. Meat is an excellent source of protein and other essential elements of a healthy diet.
3. Meat eating should not be frowned upon.
4. Wheat is murder.
5. You don't make friends with salad!
cause.mission: To provide a healthy alternative to Vegetarianism/Veganism.
cause.name: Eat Meat
